description:
During a Gym Battle against Giovanni, Gary Oak choose Arcanine as his second Pokémon after he was forced to switch out his Nidoking against Giovanni`s Kingler.
Gary Oak quickly told Arcanine to charge at Kingler and then use a flamethrower attack. Even though Arcanine was at a type disadvantage, it defeated Kingler using a Fire Blast attack.
Giovanni`s next choice in Pokémon was Mewtwo who quickly defeated Arcanine using Psychic.
name: Windie (Ookido Shigeru)
